testcase.name: lineOfSight should correctly handle an array of size 4
upsweepSequential should correctly handle the chunk 1 until 4 of an array of 4 elements
downsweepSequential should correctly handle a 4 element array when the starting angle is zero
downsweep should correctly compute the output for a non-zero starting angle
